summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: For once, we have a pretty happy FPL pod crew. After game week one, we discuss why we think Jota is an FPL gift.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Jota looked so good when he played.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: I feel like Diogo Jota is a bit of a gift in a way, becauseâ€¦.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: It's always...when you take in consideration his own FPL heritage.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: We're having to go without you, so please don't punish us.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: He's 5 million less...the way that Diogo Jota is playing.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: If you don't have Haaland, then you're likely to have Salah.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: As we said,...it's a great day out.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: The most frustrating thing as an FPL manager because you can't get the player that you really want to have.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: He actually impressed me against Leicester in that first half.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Madison...I thought it was really, really sharp physically too.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: I was buzzing when I saw Pedro Porro scored.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: If you went for Salah... you were better off.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: If he's out of game week two, then I might think about selling him.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: It's amazing to see Danny Welbeck with a performance like that.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Danny Welbeck...had an absolutely phenomenal game.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: He was really the only good thing going forward for this Manchester United team.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: A bit of a gift in a way.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: It feels quite early to do that now.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: It's surprising to see Ollie Watkins being sold quite heavily.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: The only way is up... if you start at the bottom.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Haaland at home against Ipswich...It's a game you would expect him to score.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: It's a long old season to regret that decision for, isn't it?

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: A lot of managers are looking at it potentially with a view that...I think he could be a nice pick.
